coreAttributes.name: trainer
coreAttributes.description: A pair of shoes made from flexible rubber and breathable cloth. Although designed to be worn when performing physical exercise, they are widely used for everyday wear.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the trainers and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the trainers and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the trainers and [npc.verb(tie)] up the laces.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc.her] trainers, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] trainers, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] trainers, before tugging them off.
